issue.title: Build a Book Library System
issue.body:
## Book Library Management System

Build a full-stack book library app with Next.js, SQLite, and Playwright tests.

## Features
- Add/edit/delete books (title, author, ISBN, year)
- List books with search
- Mark books as borrowed/returned

## Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 App Router + Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Next.js API routes
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Testing**: Playwright

## File Structure
```
app/
  layout.tsx, page.tsx
  books/[id]/page.tsx, books/new/page.tsx
  api/books/route.ts, api/books/[id]/route.ts
lib/db.ts
components/BookCard.tsx, BookForm.tsx
tests/books.spec.ts
```

## Setup Files
- package.json, tsconfig.json, tailwind.config.ts
- next.config.js, playwright.config.ts, .gitignore
